name: Inhabitant Evil [FREE][GAME]
description:
My second unity project! My first that involves any movement and path finding. All coding and art was done by me.

You can buy the ghoul animation from the game here:  https://combosmooth.itch.io/top-down-ghoul-run-sprite-animation
